-- retrieveRfpSearchList 요청서 목록 조회 select m.* from ( select a.RFP_ID as rfpId ,a.TITLE as title ,a.REQ_DATE as reqDate ,a.RSECH_ENGN as rsechEngn ,a.SUBMIT_YN as submitYn ,dbo.fn_getSabunName(a.RGST_EMP_NO) as rgstNm ,a.RGST_EMP_NO as rgstEmpNo from IRIS_OPN_RFP_MST a where a.DEL_YN ='N' ) m where 1=1
AND m.title LIKE '%'+#{title}+'%'
AND m.rgstNm LIKE '%'+#{rgstNm}+'%'
AND m.rgstEmpNo = #{_userSabun}
ORDER BY m.rfpId desc

-- retrieveRfpInfo select a.RFP_ID as rfpId ,a.TITLE as title ,a.REQ_DATE as reqDate ,a.RSECH_ENGN as rsechEngn ,a.DESC_TCLG as descTclg ,a.EXPT_APPL as exptAppl ,a.MAIN_REQ as mainReq ,a.BENCH_MARK_TCLG as benchMarkTclg ,a.COLABO_TCLG as colaboTclg ,a.TIMELINE as timeline ,a.COMMENTS as comments ,a.COMPANY_NM as companyNm ,a.PJT_IMG_VIEW as pjtImgView ,a.SUBMIT_YN as submitYn ,a.RGST_EMP_NO as rgstEmpNo from IRIS_OPN_RFP_MST a where a.DEL_YN = 'N' and a.RFP_ID = #{rfpId}
